Of course I had some duplicates, I'd say perhaps 10 duplicates per pack of 50 (meaning in the end I had about 20 duplicates, and this is if you count the cards with different art, from different sets, etc). The pack contained mostly common Pokemon cards with enough uncommon cards to keep me satisfied about my purchase as well as about 10-15 trainer cards and no energy cards. The cards were all in great condition and were all from the newer sets.All-in-all for someone like me, looking to start over it was a good purchase, and I'd definitely recommend it for someone who is just about to start out on Pokemon, for a younger child looking to get into card collecting, or as simple party favors for a Pokemon-themed party.If you have been collecting Pokemon cards for a while, then this is not the product for you as it does not contain any rare or highly desired cards.Happy buying!
